name: Vita
goal: Vita is an Irish INGO fighting hunger and climate change in Africa for nearly 30 years. We have a high impact, low carbon not-for-profit social impact investment fund which transforms lives in Africa while delivering climate mitigation targets. It is a next generation model of development that allows investors to realise a triple bottom line in terms or return, environment and social impact. We are in receipt of funding from the EU and Irish Aid, as well as a range of private philanthropic donors.
interests: Agriculture, Climate Action, Communication, Energy, Environment, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development
euInitiatives: We are advocates for climate change and poverty reduction in Africa
